Rio Formoso is a municipality in Pernamb: Boundaries -   Sirinhaém (N);  Tamandaré  (S);  Gameleira  (W); Tamandaré and  Atlantic Ocean   (E)
Distance to Recife - 91 kmThe municipality contains part of the strictly protected Saltinho Biological Reserve
Pedra beach and Reduto beachThere are the only two beaches in Rio Formoso. The major attraction is the estuary of the Formoso River. Has an extensive area of coconut trees
